A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It absolutely takes the sage to places I didn't expect\, and for a moment or two that shook me to my very core. But then I realised I loved that. Loved that it's a continuation of the spirit of star wars\, not a simple rehash of what came before. Did it give me all the answers I craved? No. Did I come out with a big grin\, a torn apart heart\, and a want to follow the story wherever it goes? Absolutely.
